text: This article is about the Chinese idiom 画蛇添足. Most Chinese idioms are composed of 4 characters.四个人来参加比赛。有一个人很快就画好了，看到别人还在画，最后他给蛇画了四只脚。他输掉了比赛，因为蛇本来就是没有脚的！There was a competition: whoever painted the best snake could drink beer.Four people entered the competition. One person quickly finished his drawing then saw that others were still painting, he ended up painting four feet on the snake. He did not win the competition because snakes do not have feet!This story tells us to not do unnecessary things.
